messages.message:
<!channel>, I’ve integrated github with reviewable.io (http://reviewable.io) (Tried setting up Phabricator, but failed miserably).  We are on a 30 day free trial.  After that it is 127$ for 25 people.

The benefits are:
• Integrates directly with GitHub, you create a PR in GitHub and it shows up in your reviewable dashboard
• You get a dashboard view of Assigned, Created, Related PRs.  Quite easy to navigate
• Stores the comments as drafts until you actually publish them (Avoids multiple emails for every reply to a comment)
• Allows you to specify that a file-revision has been reviewed.  This allows for easier subsequent reviews where one only needs to review what has changed

Please try to use it for the next few days to see how it works.  I’ll add a reviewable guide to make using this more easy.
You can simply connect to reviewable.io (http://reviewable.io) with your GitHub account that you use for Instabase
